summary: Completed frontend testing of crypto trading system integration. All requested features are working correctly: Dashboard shows Optimal Allocation widget with pie chart and Multi-Asset Signals with UP/DOWN predictions, Training page has Portfolio Allocation Models section with Train DL Model and Train RL Agent buttons, Portfolio page has all 4 strategies (Traditional+ML, Deep Learning, RL Agent, Hybrid) working in Compare tab.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All portfolio integration features are working. DL and RL models show 'Not Trained' status until trained - this is expected behavior. Hybrid strategy combines only trained strategies (currently just traditional_ml).

dashboard_tests.details: Shows ETH DOWN -16.37%, BNB UP +30.46%, BTC visible

dashboard_tests.details: Button visible and navigates to Portfolio

Shows BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL, XRP allocations across strategies

mocked_apis.real_data: All portfolio optimization uses real OHLCV data from exchanges

notes: All 4 portfolio strategies are visible in Compare tab
DL and RL models show 'Not Trained' until user trains them - this is expected
Hybrid strategy currently only combines traditional_ml since DL and RL are not trained
Negative returns (-24.28%) are due to current market conditions in historical data
Dashboard allocation widget shows real-time portfolio recommendations
